title: Purifying Water with Iodine
brief: Use iodine tincture to kill harmful organisms in questionable water sources.
steps: Step 1: Use 2 percent tincture of iodine for water treatment.
Step 2: For clear water: add 5 drops of iodine to a full canteen.
Step 3: For cloudy or cold water: add 10 drops of iodine to a full canteen.
Step 4: Mix the water thoroughly after adding iodine.
Step 5: Let the canteen stand for 30 minutes before drinking.
warnings: Do not use if allergic to iodine.
Pregnant women should avoid iodine water treatment if possible.
Extended use of iodine-treated water may cause thyroid problems.
